item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Disney Presents: Rodgers and Hammerstein's Cinderella (Unofficial ST) (320 KBP/s)
item.description:
​

Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderella (also known as simply Cinderella) is a 1997 American musical fantasy television film produced by Walt Disney Television.

Co-produced by Whitney Houston, who also appears as Cinderella's Fairy Godmother, the film stars Brandy in the title role and features a racially diverse ensemble cast consisting of Jason Alexander, Whoopi Goldberg, Bernadette Peters, Veanne Cox, Natalie Desselle, Victor Garber, and Paolo Montalban.

Walt Disney Television originally planned to release an original soundtrack featuring the film's music. However, this idea was abandoned due to conflicts between Houston and Brandy's respective record labels. As such, a makeshift soundtrack, compiled by fans and using audio from the official DVD, was uploaded to multiple file sharing sites sometime after the home video release.


Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: JayFantasi
